Text: CIOCTO looking for a Permanent PostionGood Afternoon This message is the introduce you to our CTO level candidate Robert Robert is looking for a permenent full time employment in the US Below is a brief profile of his achievements Please contact me for further information on his resume salary requirement and contact information Profile of Robert Designed and coordinated construction of M dedicated computer facility Designed and supervised buildout of M K sq ft office building Designed and developed mission critical intranetbased application combining ERP and CRM functionality to unify sales invoicing accounting customer service and support This involved defining new business logic and reengineering business practices across departments Conducted and supervised emerging technology research evaluation and implementation Coordinated researched and implemented all technology needs for five companies providing venture capital real estate internet software development hosting technology magazine and internet news services Designed and implemented electronic access security surveillance and safety systems Designed and implemented communication systems incorporating voice video and unified messaging platforms With Best Regards Rohel Mahmud Account Manager Zaconta Tel ext Fax email website wwwzacontacom
